div.p: KIRBY: You know, I think it's easy to perceive that everyone around you is doing something if you kind of WANT to do it or if you expect that it's a normal thing,
but I think that the level of high risk... the amount of high risk drinkers in any given population is probably less than I had imagined when I was drinking,

and I think that's a common mistake to think that everyone's doing it and it's normal for me to do it because everyone else is doing it too, but I think that it's never as much as people really imagine.
